# TouchList

**Class**

The `TouchList` class is used to represent a collection of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/touch] objects. For example, the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/touchevent/1629351-changedtouches] method in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/touchevent] returns a `TouchList` object.

## Declaration

```swift
interface TouchList
```

## Accessing Properties

- **length**: The number of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/touch] objects in this `TouchList` object.

## Getting Touch Objects

- **item**: Returns the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/touch] object at the given index.
